General.Name: Nanjing ESTUN Automation Co Ltd
General.Description: Estun Automation Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of intelligent equipment and its control and functional components in China. The company provides industrial automation products, such as motion, drive, and motor products; industrial robots, including articulated and welding robots; industrial digital products comprising e-noesis open industrial internet platform, PCS production line process master control system, and industrial software; and smart control units, as well as robot peripheral products. It also offers machine tool, robotic, packaging and printing machine, wood working machine, photovoltaic, semiconductor machine, entertainment facility, and materials handling equipment solutions. Estun Automation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Nanjing, China.

3.Name: Ms. Yuan  Qin
